page.title: 08Some businesses in Pitsea .
page.content:
INDUSTRY. Most of the industrial firms are in Wat Tyler Way.Two firms are involved in metal manufacturing.Another firm makes electrical componants.There is another business which sells paving slabs and also makes various cement products such as drain guards. CAR FIRMS There are several garages which include petrol filling stations and which service cars.Tesco's superstore also has a petrol filling station.Down Wat Tyler Way there are several small car businesses.These carry out various work such as car breaking and car spraying.
Wat Tyler Way where most of these businesses are situated was once marshland. Pitsea Junior School Group.
